attributes.action: The Climate Emergency is here. The solutions are already known. We must act now.
attributes.additional_details:
The State of the Climate and what we might do about it, Professor, Sir Nicholas Stern, https://www.ted.com/talks/lord_nicholas_stern_the_state_of_the_climate_and_what_we_might_do_about_it

100 Solutions to Reverse Global Warming, Chad Frischmann, https://www.ted.com/talks/chad_frischmann_100_solutions_to_climate_change?language=en

Global Warming of 1.5 degrees, IPCC - Summary for Policy Makers https://www.ipcc.ch/sr15/chapter/summary-for-policy-makers/
attributes.background: Projections for Climate Change over the next 12 yrs (IPCC 2018) present the easiest choice we've ever had: A) continue business as usual, leading to catastrophic climate change by end of century and endangering all life on earth, B) act now to scale up known solutions and create a liveable future

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
